title: MNF Preview: Seahawks-Eagles Gambling Picks, Props & DFS Advice (Football 11/30)
description:
Is the Carson Wentz era in Philadelphia in jeopardy? Will Brinson and Mike McClure break down Seahawks-Eagles on Monday Night Football, a game where Jalen Hurts is expected to see increased usage. The guys break down what that means from a gambling standpoint, addressing the impact of the QB on the game, player props and DFS builds. On the Seattle side, Chris Carson is someone to really target. Find out what other picks and props the guys like by listening to the full episode!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @Mike5754
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
